spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout roughly matches (living/dining left, kitchen central, two bedrooms right, bath/WC central-bottom), but key spatial elements diverge: the balcony shown on the 2D plan is not modeled; living area window/door arrangement does not match the plan’s balcony opening; proportions appear inflated in the living/dining zone relative to the bedroom block; and there appears to be an added/changed connection toward the garage side compared to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall networks and adjacencies are broadly consistent (hall to bedrooms/bath/WC, kitchen adjacent to living), but structural fidelity is reduced by the missing balcony space and likely a hallucinated internal access/door relationship with the garage not indicated on the 2D plan. Door embedding looks generally clean, but the exterior openings (balcony/entry side) do not faithfully follow the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen, bath fixtures, and laundry elements are present and plausibly placed, but exact fixture placement and scale cannot be confirmed as matching the 2D plan; the render omits any living/dining furniture that could validate the large open area proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and clean materials; geometry is mostly crisp. However, the camera is perspective rather than a true isometric/orthographic match, which reduces verification clarity. Minor scale/perception distortion from the viewpoint makes proportion checking harder.

detected_errors.description: Balcony space shown on the 2D plan (off the lounge) is missing in the 3D render.
Balcony opening/door from lounge (top-left in plan) is not represented; instead the living area shows standard windows/openings inconsistent with the plan’s balcony access.
Window placement in the living/lounge zone appears inconsistent with the 2D plan (extra/shifted windows versus a primary balcony opening).

Likely hallucinated internal garage access/door relationship: the 3D render suggests a connection/door toward the garage that is not indicated on the 2D plan (garage appears separate with no internal door shown).
Proportion distortion: the living/dining area appears oversized relative to the bedroom/bath core compared to the 2D plan’s dimensions and relative balance.
